entry.title: $2673 // All units feature large sun-filled windows, brand new appliances
entry.content:
ID
16225

Introducing 1460 Fulton, a brand new building in Bed-Stuy offering 24 luxury rental units. All units feature large sun-filled windows, brand new appliances, and unit a/c. Amenities include an elevator, lounge, gym, laundry room, and roof deck. Transportation options feature easy access to the A and C trains at Nostrand, Kingston - Throop, as well as the Long Island Rail Road (LIRR). Net Effective Pricing advertised.
